description: Our conversation with actor Jonah Hill went a bit too long for the broadcast – but we saved you some of the best parts. He tells Rico about the ‘theme song’ he selected for his “Wolf of Wall Street” character and about his journey from “Superbad” to today.

contentencoded: Our conversation with actor Jonah Hill went a bit too long for the broadcast – but we saved you some of the best parts. He tells Rico about the ‘theme song’ he selected for his “Wolf of Wall Street” character and about his journey from “Superbad” to today.

title: Going Long with Jonah Hill
